name: Gunslinger

hit_points.hit_points_higher_levels: 1d10 (or 6) + Constitution modifier per Gunslinger level after 1st

equipment: A Gunslinger’s kit (includes firearm maintenance tools, 20 rounds of ammunition)

1.name: Gunslinger’s Focus
1.description:
You have a heightened sense of perception and focus in combat. You gain a pool of Focus Points equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1). You can spend Focus Points to:
- Deadeye Shot (1 point): Gain advantage on an attack roll with a firearm.
- Quick Draw: Add Focus points (up to 3) to your initiative roll.
Focus Points are replenished after a short or long rest.

2.name: Gunplay
2.description: You can use your firearms with incredible skill. You can attack twice whenever you take the Attack action with a firearm.

3.name: Gunslinger Creed
3.description:
Choose a creed that defines your Gunslinger:
- The Protector
- The Avenger
- The Wanderer
Each creed grants features at 3rd, 7th, 10th, and 15th levels.

5.name: Fan the Hammer
5.description: As an action, you can spend 2 Focus Points to make an attack against every creature in a 15-foot cone. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC = 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Dexterity modifier) or take 1d6 piercing damage per your level in this class.

6.name: Gunslinger’s Reflexes
6.description: You can add your proficiency bonus to your AC against one ranged attack per round.

9.name: Ka-Tet Bond
9.description: You can sense allies bound to your fate. As a bonus action, you can give an ally within 30 feet advantage on their next attack roll, ability check, or saving throw.

10.name: Guns of your Father
10.description: You are old enough and wise enough for your father to pass his guns to you; your guns now deal 1d10 damage.

11.name: Endless Focus
11.description: Once per day, when you roll initiative, you regain all your Focus Points.

14.name: Ricochet Shot
14.description: Your bullets defy physics. You can make an attack roll against a creature behind cover, ignoring the cover penalty.

18.name: The Gunslinger’s Code
18.description:
You embody the ancient Gunslinger creed. As a bonus action, you can mark a target within 60 feet. For the next minute, you gain the following benefits:
- Advantage on attack rolls against the target.
- The target has disadvantage on saving throws against your abilities.

20.name: The White Tower
20.description:
You connect with the power of the Tower itself. Once per long rest, you can summon the following effects for 1 minute:
- All Focus Point abilities cost 0 points.
- Your movement speed doubles.
- Firearm attacks critically hit on a roll of 18-20.

3.name: Shield Ally
3.description: When an ally within 5 feet is attacked, you can use your reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack roll.

7.name: Hold the Line
7.description: Allies within 10 feet of you gain a +2 AC bonus.

10.name: Inspiring Presence
10.description: Allies within 30 feet can add your Wisdom modifier to their saving throws.

15.name: Unyielding Guardian
15.description: When an ally is reduced to 0 HP within 30 feet, you can use your reaction to restore them to 1 HP.

3.name: Vengeance Strike
3.description: When you hit a creature that damaged you, add an extra 1d6 damage.

7.name: Bloody Retribution
7.description: Once per turn, you can deal an extra 2d6 damage to a creature below its hit point maximum.

10.name: Deadly Aim
10.description: Firearms ignore resistance to nonmagical attacks.

15.name: Executioner’s Shot
15.description: Once per long rest, you can deal 10d10 damage on a critical hit.

3.name: Gunslinger’s Mysticism
3.description: Learn two cantrips from the Druid or Wizard spell list.

7.name: Mystic Shots
7.description: Spend Focus Points to imbue bullets with elemental energy (fire, ice, or lightning).

10.name: Sixth Sense
10.description: You can cast detect magic or see invisibility once per short rest.

15.name: Portal Walker
15.description: You can cast dimension door once per long rest.
